languages.text: {n}Одинокая слеза чертит дорожку на копоти, покрывающей лицо мужчины. Но голос его звучит твердо и ровно:{/n} "Это было необходимо? Убивать двух девчонок?"
{n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"
languages.original_text: {n}Одинокая слеза чертит дорожку на копоти, покрывающей лицо мужчины. Но голос его звучит твердо и ровно:{/n} "Это было необходимо? Убивать двух девчонок?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A single tear leaves a trail in the soot covering the man's face, but his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that necessary? Killing two little girls?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: {n}A single tear leaves a trail in the soot covering the man's face, but his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that necessary? Killing two little girls?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

traits.locale_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}Una lágrima recorre su mejilla, dejando un rastro húmedo en el hollín que cubre su cara. Sin embargo, su voz es firme:{/n} «¿De verdad era necesario? ¿Tenían que morir Nemi y Mia?».
languages.original_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una lágrima recorre su mejilla, dejando un rastro húmedo en el hollín que cubre su cara. Sin embargo, su voz es firme:{/n} «¿De verdad era necesario? ¿Tenían que morir Nemi y Mia?».
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}涙が頬を伝い、男の顔を覆う煤に、じわりと跡ができる。しかし、男はハッキリとした口調で話す。{/n}「本当に必要でしたか？ネミとミアは死ななければならなかったのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}涙が頬を伝い、男の顔を覆う煤に、じわりと跡ができる。しかし、男はハッキリとした口調で話す。{/n}「本当に必要でしたか？ネミとミアは死ななければならなかったのか？」
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}一滴眼泪从他的脸颊上滚落，在他满是煤灰的脸上留下了漆黑的痕迹，但他的语气没有一丝动摇。{/n}“这么做真的有必要吗？涅米和米娅真的非死不可吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一滴眼泪从他的脸颊上滚落，在他满是煤灰的脸上留下了漆黑的痕迹，但他的语气没有一丝动摇。{/n}“这么做真的有必要吗？涅米和米娅真的非死不可吗？”
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}Eine Träne rollt seine Wange hinab und hinterlässt eine feuchte Spur im Ruß auf seinem Gesicht. Seine Stimme bleibt allerdings fest:{/n}"War das wirklich nötig? Mussten Nemi und Mia sterben?"
languages.original_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Träne rollt seine Wange hinab und hinterlässt eine feuchte Spur im Ruß auf seinem Gesicht. Seine Stimme bleibt allerdings fest:{/n}"War das wirklich nötig? Mussten Nemi und Mia sterben?"
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}Une unique larme vient laisser une trace sur son visage autrement couvert de suie. Sa voix, néanmoins, reste ferme.{/n} « Était-ce vraiment nécessaire ? Fallait-il vraiment que Nemi et Mia meurent ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une unique larme vient laisser une trace sur son visage autrement couvert de suie. Sa voix, néanmoins, reste ferme.{/n} « Était-ce vraiment nécessaire ? Fallait-il vraiment que Nemi et Mia meurent ? »
traits.speaker: MasterInfernus

languages.text: {n}Yanaklarından bir gözyaşı damlası süzülüyor, yüzünü kaplayan isin üzerinde nemli bir iz bırakıyor. Yine de sesinde herhangi bir titreme duyulmuyor.{/n} "Bu gerçekten gerekli miydi? Nemi'nin ve Mia'nın gerçekten ölmesi gerekiyor muydu?"
languages.original_text: {n}A tear rolls down his cheek, leaving a damp trail through the soot covering his face. Yet his voice remains steady:{/n} "Was that really necessary? Did Nemi and Mia have to die?"
